resources.string: Use NetCheck to quickly access any web resource. You can, for example, have a look at the source code of some web page or check the network access to verifying that your firewall and add-blockers are running propperly.
NetCheck will try to connect to the following web resource to check if it can find an expected string:
This is what the requested web page returned:
Here you will find the log
Error retrieving web resource, this may help you debugging:
No connection: There was a timeout or there is no internet connection.
Authentication failure when accessing the URL, network seems to be ok..?
Server error, but connection seems to be ok.
Network error while performing the request.
Error when parsing the server response, but connection seems to be ok.
This may be caused by a typo in your URL: Please double check the URL!
